Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class SteelBrick

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.Brick
project.chenlin_17.Views.SteelBrick
class SteelBrick extends Brick
This steel brick class is the concrete class extends from the brick class.
Steel brick type would break according to a generated random value. Note: Its class name is steel brick, which makes its previous name "Brick3" readable.
It contains changes from the awt to javafx.
It contains changes of class variables according to Bob's code convention.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN

    void
    repair()
    This function helps repair the brick for replaying purpose by re adding the ball face or the image ball face if it used to have one.
    It resets the broken status to false and allowable strokes to 3.

    • repair

      public void repair()
      This function helps repair the brick for replaying purpose by re adding the ball face or the image ball face if it used to have one.
      It resets the broken status to false and allowable strokes to 3.
      Specified by:
      repair in class Brick
